content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. Let's discuss the rental price. Based on the size of the apartment and the current market conditions, I'm willing to consider a rental price of 500 Euros per month. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am not sure, I need to think about it. Can you give me some time to consider?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Of course, I understand. Please feel free to take some time to think about the rental price. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask. I look forward to hearing your decision.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am not sure, I need to think about it. Can you give me some time to consider?
I agree to the price of 450 Euros per month.
TERMINATE.
Thank you for considering my offer.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and I'm glad that we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. I'm pleased that you agreed to 450 Euros per month, which is a fair market value for the apartment's size and location. I hope that you enjoy your stay in the apartment. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask. Thank you again for your business.
name: Heinrich Heine
